meta.title: Educational Consulting, Education Strategists, Educational Planning - Warrensville, oh

meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.content: based in Warrensville, t-squared honors academy is an independent educational consulting agency, helping parents and their children find the best school to suit their academic needs and plans.

meta.name: KEYWORDS
meta.content: educational strategy, scholastic aptitude, educational consulting, childs education, Warrensville, oh

div.p: LEADING THE WORLD IN SOCIAL REFORM

div.style: left: 0px; top: 382px; width: 62px; height: 73px; position: absolute; z-index: 101;

div.p: Enrollment is very easy and there is NO tuition to attend this institution of learning. Please stop by and pick up an enrollment packet for your scholar.

div.p: The school has provided information about the College Credit Plus Program in the beginning of the year. If you are interested in your child participating, please contact us for more information: 216-510-5458

div.p: Ohio Means Jobs is another resouce that helps our scholars find their way to a better future.
If any of our parents are interested in helping their scholar find careers, go to Ohio Means Jobs K-12 website:

p.span: Learning is an ongoing and dynamic process. At T-Squared Honors Academy, we use varied methods to continually measure each child's progress and abilities. Differentiated instruction caters to the needs of each child because we believe that every child learns differently.

div.style: left: 328px; top: 615px; width: 280px; height: 50px; position: absolute; z-index: 101;
border-style: none; border-color: rgb(55, 55, 55); background-image: none; opacity: 1; box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.5); background-color: transparent;
left: 328px; top: 655px; width: 280px; height: 1px; position: absolute; z-index: 101;
left: 312px; top: 847px; width: 280px; height: auto; position: absolute; z-index: 101;
border-style: none; border-color: rgb(55, 55, 55); background-image: none; position: relative; opacity: 1; box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.5); background-color: transparent;
div.p: Your scholars future is very important to us that is why we try to go on two college visits a year as a part of our high school program. Our high school students must complete a career exploratory track and narrow down their college choices by the end of their junior years. Our juniors apply to their colleges in the first month of their senior year, take the ACT twice their junior year and are provided FREE ACT prep classes to help their scores.

div.style: left: 0px; top: 1040px; width: 10px; height: 74px; position: absolute; z-index: 101;
top: 1040px; width: 10px; height: 74px; right: 0px; position: absolute; z-index: 101;
left: 639px; top: 945px; width: 293px; height: auto; position: absolute; z-index: 101;

div.p: "T-Squared Honors Academy really prepares my child for the future. The small class sizes and the encouragement from the program directors to become more involved in our child's education supports our goal to participate in our child's future. Try T-Squared and you will fall in love." --9th grade parent
